#summary Deviations from the N-Triples/N-Quads specs.

So far, the following deviations from the [http://www.w3.org/TR/n-triples/ N-Triples]/[http://www.w3.org/TR/n-quads/ N-Quads] spec are known:
 * Parts of a statement (e.g. subject, predicate,...) are expected to separated by at least one whitespace character (space, tab, ...).
